description:
"Kotori-chan" is Takanashi Souta in drag. The name `Kotori` derives from a more straightforward reading of `小鳥`, using the ordinary kun-yomi readings of the kanji rather than the variant nanori reading that becomes `Takanashi`. Despite his distaste for cross-dressing, Takanashi is convinced to do so when Inami`s father visits Wagnaria, and again during his date with her.
Taneshima idolizes Kotori-chan as being the woman she aspires to be.
name: Kotori-chan
